participant_1.background:
I'm not a morning person, but I'll do it for my best friend.
I'm not sure if I'm good at keeping up with my family, but I love them and I try to make time for them whenever I can.
I am an only child and I am excited to start a new chapter in my life at college.
under a pen name , i write romance books.
i live with a roommate.

participant_2.background:
I'm a parent who feels like a failure, but I'm trying to make things better by taking care of my cat.
I'm lucky to have such a great dog to share my life with.
i am currently listening to bach.
I have a close relationship with my family and enjoy sharing my memories and seashells with them.
i am dating my boss.

content.text: Hi there!
Hi! How are you?
I'm doing well, thanks! I'm excited to start my new chapter in life at college.
That's great! I'm sure you'll do great things.
Thanks! I'm nervous but also excited.
I can imagine! What are you most excited about?
I'm excited to meet new people and learn new things.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll make some great friends.
Thanks! I'm hoping so.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to write, read, and watch movies.
That's cool! I like to read and watch movies too.
What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of books, but I especially enjoy historical fiction and romance novels.
I like to read romance novels too! What are some of your favorite authors?
I love the books by Jane Austen and Georgette Heyer.
I've heard good things about Jane Austen's books. I've never read any of them, but I've been meaning to.
You should definitely read them! They're really great.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! I'm always happy to recommend books to people.
Hey, I just realized we have a lot in common! We both like to write, read, and watch movies. We both like romance novels. We both like dogs. And we both have close relationships with our families.
That's so cool! I'm glad we have so much in common.
Me too! I think we're going to be great friends.
I think so too
